summary: Adds lost of Weapons, Apparel, misc, books and some other stuff  via console with batch.
descriptionHtml:
Attempting to add just about all the unique or rare items I can find on the skyrimsearch.com site (NO JUNK). This was made because I lost all my items that were stored in a Mod home that I accidentally un-ticked (The name in the plugin side was completely different) in NMM and overwrote my save. Weapons, books, misc and Apparel available. 

Unzip download and move what you want to the skyrim folder. 
E.G C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim 
support for all official DLC and will still work if you don\'t have any. load order should be like this though...
Dragonborn = 04
Hearthfire = 03
Dawnguard = 02


Once the file has been moved, launch the game and press ~ to open the console, then type \'bat\' and the name of the .txt you wish to execute. For example...
bat all
bat weapons
bat apparel
and so on. All the names of the bats are in the compressed file 

                                         The main file contains
ALL - All batch in this zip are combined into one 
Apparel - Unique and little amount of basic apparel
Books - Manly journals and notes and some others with interesting names
Bows - Unique and basic bows are added
Build - All the hearthfire construction materials youll ever need
Claws - All the dragon claws
Gems - All the type of gems
Guard - All the guards uniforms and shields
Hides - Some of the mainly used hides in the game
Masks - All dragon masks and Special masks not in a uniform eg. Visage of Mzund
Metals - Ingots and ore including heartstone and stalhrim
Misc - Dragon bones scales child\'s doll etc NO JUNK lots of unobtainable items to collect
Soul - Adds some high end soul gems
Weapon - Unique weapons found throughout all 3 DLC and Skyrim base game

                                                Optional file contains
Advanceskills - Puts all your skills to level 100
Removeallperks - Removes your perks
Stats - Suppose to get your stats

                                                          NOTES
*Deathbrand - Can only get two out of four to work on mine?
*Dragonborn - Dont think I have 100% Dragonborn DLC item support
*Screen shot - I use SKYUI, it makes the menus look and function different (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863)
author: Grizzly bear
